name: Harini Sivanandh
title: Professional Dancer & Choreographer
bio: Harini is a passionate performer and dance teacher with over 10 years of experience specializing in contemporary, hip-hop, and classical Indian dance styles. He has choreographed for stage shows, music videos, and competitive teams.

performances.title: Urban Rhythms 2024
performances.description: Performed a fusion of hip-hop and Indian folk styles at the annual Urban Rhythms event.

performances.title: Dance India Festival
performances.description: Solo Bharatanatyam performance in the cultural festival held in Chennai.

testimonials.name: Ayesha Singh
testimonials.quote: Harini's energy is contagious and his choreography helped me build confidence on stage!

testimonials.name: Ravi Menon
testimonials.quote: A true professional â€” Harini brought our cultural event to life with his performance.
